message.content:
cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.AR

Reasoning: 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on designing and evaluating a touch-less motion interaction technology for developing pervasive games on wearable devices. 
- cs.GR (Graphics) is also likely as the paper involves developing augmented reality games with dynamic gestures. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is relevant as the proposed touch-less interaction technology is based on vision-based wearable devices. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is relevant as the paper involves developing interactive games with multimedia elements such as augmented reality. 
- cs.AR (Augmented Reality) is also relevant as the paper focuses on developing augmented reality games with touch-less interaction technology.
